participant_1.background:
I would like to spend more time with my family.
I like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts.
I am recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing.
Unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.
I graduated with a business degree , and marketing is all that i really enjoyed.

participant_2.background:
I am headed to university of michigan in the fall.
I want to be a doctor when i graduate.
My favorite season is summer.
I just graduated high school.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. I just graduated from college and I'm looking for a job in marketing.
Hi, my name is participant_2. I just graduated from high school and I'm headed to the University of Michigan in the fall.
What are you going to study at U of M?
I'm going to study pre-med. I want to be a doctor when I graduate.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great doctor.
Thanks! I hope so.
What are you most looking forward to about college?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and learning new things. I'm also excited to get involved in some extracurricular activities.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started.
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to read, play sports, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those sound like great hobbies. I love to read and play sports too.
What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby.
I've heard good things about that book. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. I'm glad I could help.
It's been nice talking to you.
You too. Have a great day!
You too!
